lead_paragraph: A resident of British Columbia has tested positive for the H7N9 avian flu virus in the first documented case of the infection in a human in North America, the federal government said Monday.
snippet: A resident of British Columbia has tested positive for the H7N9 avian flu virus in the first documented case of the infection in a human in North America, the federal government said Monday.

headline.main: Canada: Residents Tests Positive for H7N9 Bird Flu After Trip to China
headline.print_headline: Canada: Residents Tests Positive for H7N9 Bird Flu After Trip to China
